title: Ticket #5928: General improvements to the HTCondor manual
description:
General suggestions for improving the manual (note: this is going to be a long-term ongoing project -- add more things here as we think of them):

Examples:

  • Make multiple simple examples that each illustrate a single concept, rather than trying to group multiple concepts into a single example.
  • Examples should be more complete (e.g., an entire submit file rather than a snippet of a submit file).
  • Examples should have more comments (don't just explain things in the associated prose -- comments should clarify).

Wiki recipes:

  • Possibly have a LaTeX macro that generates the link based on the name in the Wiki (rather than having to put in an explicit URL); macro could even do something like include a link to all recipes.
